idea-plugin.name: Git Branch Manager
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin enhance IDE works with GIT branches in multi module project. It provides GIT branch batch operations on loaded into project repo. Also plugin provide GUI interface available at VCS -> Branch Manager.
Features:
* Check out same branch in multiple Git repositories
* Switch repositories to already existed branch. Plugin find common branches in selected repositories and suggest to choose one to be checked out.
* Remove unneeded local branches. Plugin shows branches that do not have tracking remotes and allow to delete them
